title: Highest Deposit Interest Rate
description: In 2023, Argentina had the highest deposit interest rate in the world at 94.99%.

title: Highest Growth in Claims on Central Government
description: Argentina experienced the highest annual growth in claims on the central government as a percentage of broad money, reaching 341.37% in 2023.

title: Lowest Net Financial Flows from IMF
description: In 2023, Argentina had the lowest net financial flows from the IMF, with a negative flow of -5,073,959,569.2 USD.

title: Lowest IFC Private Nonguaranteed Financial Flows
description: Argentina recorded the lowest IFC private nonguaranteed financial flows in 2023, amounting to -139,947,843.74 USD.
